# Riku Lauttia - AI Engineer & Co-Founder

> AI Engineer and serial co-founder based in Turku, Finland. Building innovative solutions at the intersection of artificial intelligence and enterprise technology.

## Overview

Riku Lauttia is an AI Engineer and serial entrepreneur with expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and enterprise AI solutions. Currently contributing to Teleste's broadband R&D team while co-founding multiple ventures including Since AI, Root, Kolt, and Attractor.

- Location: Turku, Finland
- Email: riku@lauttia.com
- Status: Available for consulting and partnerships
- Website: https://rikulauttia.com

## Key Pages

### Homepage
https://rikulauttia.com
Main landing page with overview of current ventures, featured writing, and availability status.

### About
https://rikulauttia.com/about
Background, education (University of Turku, VSP), skills in AI/ML, software engineering, and leadership. AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and Full Stack Open certified.

### Work Experience
https://rikulauttia.com/work
Professional experience including:
- Software Engineer at Teleste (April 2025 - Present)
- Co-Founder at Since AI (January 2025 - Present)
- Co-Founder at Root (January 2025 - Present)
- Co-Founder at Kolt (July 2024 - Present)
- Co-Founder at Attractor (October 2025 - Present)
- Partnerships Lead at Boost Turku (January 2025 - December 2025)
- Technical Solutions Specialist at VSP (January 2023 - May 2023)

### Projects & Ventures
https://rikulauttia.com/projects
Current active projects:
- Since AI: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform and hackathon
- Root: Nordic region's premier innovative recruiting event
- Kolt: Automation solutions for complex operational challenges
- Attractor: Technology consultancy building production-grade software and AI systems

## Core Expertise

### Artificial Intelligence
Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, MLOps & AI Strategy

### Software Engineering
Python, C++, JavaScript, React, Full-Stack Development, Cloud Infrastructure (AWS), Microservices Architecture, DevOps & CI/CD, System Design

### Leadership & Strategy
Startup Co-Founding, Strategic Partnerships, Business Development, Technology Innovation, Team Leadership, Product Strategy

## Quick Facts

- **Education**: University of Turku (Information and Communication Technology), VSP
- **Thesis**: "The Role of Artificial Intelligence in Analyzing Large Datasets and Its Utilization in Commercial Decision-Making"
- **Certifications**: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (March 2025), Full Stack Open - University of Helsinki (November 2024)
- **Location**: Turku, Southwest Finland, Finland
- **Companies Founded**: 4+ (Since AI, Root, Kolt, Attractor)
- **Experience**: 5+ years in AI/ML and software engineering
- **Current Role**: Software Engineer at Teleste + Multiple Co-Founder roles

## Current Ventures

1. **Since AI** (https://sinceai.fi)
   - Role: Co-Founder
   - Focus: AI hackathon and innovation platform
   - Status: Active
   - Impact: Strategic partnerships with global tech leaders

2. **Root** (https://rootexpo.fi)
   - Role: Co-Founder
   - Focus: Innovative recruiting events
   - Status: Active
   - Impact: 1000+ participants, connecting top talent with leading tech companies

3. **Kolt** (https://kolt.fi)
   - Role: Co-Founder
   - Focus: Automation solutions for complex operational challenges
   - Status: Active
   - Stage: Early-stage R&D and product development

4. **Attractor** (https://attractor.fi)
   - Role: Co-Founder
   - Focus: Technology consultancy, production-grade software, applied AI, security-first systems
   - Status: Active
   - Services: Client discovery, AI implementation, solution architecture
